updates.content:
We have received reports from our customers of failing builds on Vercel with error 502 I/O Error while performing requests to graphql.datocms.com

It looks like that our CDN provider (Fastly) has an open issue related to the San Jose California datacenter: https://www.fastlystatus.com/incident/375837 

Since Vercel is building your projects from San Francisco, it's very likely that they will end to the San Jose California (SJC) Fastly datacenter.

This is *not* related to Vercel. You might get these errors if you build your project in California.

name: Builds failing on Vercel (or near San Jose California USA)
